name: 朱利安·杜尔西·维达
name_full: 朱利安·杜尔西·维达 Jullian Dulce Vida
birth_place: 美国,加利福尼亚州,洛杉矶

last_movies.title: 终结者外传 第一季

introduction: Jullian Dulce Vida's dream of becoming a working actor began to take shape in December 1992 when he auditioned for and won a Guest-starring role on a Saturday morning sitcom for Universal and Steven Spielberg's Amblin Entertainment called "Harry and the Henderson's". Hilary Swank had just guest-starred on the previous episode. The role gave Jullian his membership into the Screen Actors Guild and he has been a working actor ever since.Jullian Dulce Vida has been a working actor 25 years. A Vested Pensioned SAG Member.Jullian has Starred, Costarred or Supported with Jim Carrey, Angelina Jolie, Joshua Jackson, Holly Hunter, Katherine Heigl, Dennis Farina, Tea' Leoni, Michael Madsen, Ron Livingston, Elliot Gould, Adrienne Barbeau, DJ Qualls, Jaime King, John Lithgow and many others.He Costarred in "Lone Star State of Mind" Directed by David Semel for Marshall Herskovitz, Ed Zwick and Columbia Pictures.Jullian Starred as a Series regular with Katherine Heigel and Elliot Gould in CBS Pilot "Vegas Dick".He also starred with Michael Madsen, Ron Livingston and Mario Van Peebles in 20th Fox' "44 Minutes". A film about the infamous Bank of America North Hollywood shootout Directed by the brilliant DGA Award winning director Yves Simoneau.Yves and Jullian became fast friends on the set of "44 Minutes" and remain great friends today. The film was produced by Gerald Abrams Father of JJ Abrams. This Production continued Jullian's working relationship with the Abram's family.Jullian read for J.J. Abrams who was Executive Producer on a hot series at the time. After Jullian read his scene, J.J. Abrams handed Jullian a full page Monoloque, and very kindly asked Jullian to go outside for five minutes, look it over, then come back in and do the Monoloque. Jullian came back in to the audition room after five minutes and did the monologue and J.J. replied " Wow! That was great and you only had five minutes... See you on set". J.J. hired Jullian for a huge Guest Lead on 'Felicity' opposite Keri Russell.J.J. Abrams and Jullian saw each other periodically when they would take their kids to ride the Ponies in Pacific Palisades.Jullian worked alongside Jim Carrey in "Fun with Dick and Jane". He starred alongside Dennis Farina in CBS' "Buddy Faro" and worked closely with Angelina Jolie in "Gia".Studied personally with Sanford Meisner. Selected by 'Sandy' after an interview to study personally with him in a class of 20 students.Jullian has never drank alcohol, smoked or done any drugs and is very proud of that.
